Cancer
lead_paragraph: The former pitcher Rick Sutcliffe was found to have a curable form of colon cancer and will take a leave from his job as a baseball analyst for ESPN to undergo chemotherapy and surgery. Sutcliffe, 51, received the diagnosis during a physical and hoped to make a healthy comeback this year, ESPN said in a news release.
